channel.title: 2 on Barbora Hudcová
channel.description: Recent content in 2 on Barbora Hudcová

item.title: Classification of Discrete Dynamical Systems Based on Transients
item.description: We extend our previous paper about a novel method of classifying the dynamics of discrete dynamical systems. Currently, it’s in the review process for a special issue of the ALife Journal. After we receive the feedback and adjust the paper accordingly, I will publish the results here.
